Uses of Package
app.matrice

  • Packages that use app.matrice 
    Package Description
    app.curveFetting  
    app.matrice  
  • Classes in app.matrice used by app.curveFetting 
    Class and Description
    Matrix
    Matrix is a class that impelment the most used operation of matrix :
    - ADD,SUB by using the static method Matrix.operation()
    - Multiplication by using the static method Matrix.mul()
    - Diterminant by using det()
    - Transpose by using the static method Matrix.transpose()
    - Comatrice by using coMat()
    - Inverse by using Inverse()
    - Rank by using rank()
    - Echelonne form by using echelonner() , lowerEchelonner() and echelonnerReduced()
  • Classes in app.matrice used by app.matrice 
    Class and Description
    Matrix
    Matrix is a class that impelment the most used operation of matrix :
    - ADD,SUB by using the static method Matrix.operation()
    - Multiplication by using the static method Matrix.mul()
    - Diterminant by using det()
    - Transpose by using the static method Matrix.transpose()
    - Comatrice by using coMat()
    - Inverse by using Inverse()
    - Rank by using rank()
    - Echelonne form by using echelonner() , lowerEchelonner() and echelonnerReduced()
